title: Twitch Plays GIUno
desc:
Post 1713
- When you play this, you get to target someone else's empty Identity Zone instead of your own.
- Whenever anyone plays a card on this, they get to **Peek** into the hand of the target and choose a card, as well as whatever it should target.
- On the target's next turn, one of the cards that other people chose is selected at random. If it can be played, the target will be forced to play it. If not, the target can choose a card as usual.
